ritual.label: molulu ya kosala
ritual.ariaLabel: Kota na molulu - Tinda kombo na Temple Orbital

footer.credits: Orbital Temple ezali mosala ya ntɔki ya Edson Pavoni, oyo esalemi na boyokani na Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, mpe bato nyonso oyo bazali kokoba kotinda bankombo na tempelo oyo.
